alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 3:29AM AKST until February 05 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM AKST SUNDAY FOR TURNAGAIN PASS AND THE PORTAGE VALLEY... * WHAT...Blowing snow and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Turnagain Pass and the Portage Valley. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility down to a half mile. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong low pressure will move into the eastern Kenai Peninsula Sunday morning bringing snow and winds that will increase through the afternoon. The winds will slowly decrease by Sunday evening, however, the snow will continue through Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
